1. Total duration of examination is defined on the exam panel for theory exam and 25 Minutes for viva voce. 2. The clock will be set at the server. The countdown timer in the top right corner of screen will display the remaining time available for you to complete the examination. 3. The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols:
4. If candidate did not answer the Question, it will be consider as Not Answered.
5. There will be no negative marking. 6. To answer a question, do the following: 6.1 Click on the question number in the Question Palette at the right of your screen to go to that numbered question directly. Note that using this option does NOT save your answer to the current question.
6.2 Click on Mark for Review , mark it for review, and then it will go to the next question.
6.3 Procedure for answering a multiple choice type question:
7.3.1 To select your answer, click on the button of one of the options. 7.3.2 To deselect your chosen answer, click on the button of the chosen option again. 7.3.3 To mark the question for review, click on Mark for Review
